Title: ScriptAnnotations
Description: ScriptAnnotations allows MVVM frameworks, like Knockoutjs, to leverage DataAnnotations for unobtrusive JQuery / MVC style validation.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
ScriptAnnotations allows MVVM frameworks, like Knockoutjs, to leverage DataAnnotations for unobtrusive JQuery / MVC style validation.

ScriptAnnotations is a JsonConverter that serializes JSON, with data annotation meta-data embedded, so you can write validation logic on the server and render it on the client.
